statements: SELECT id, data, label FROM training_data;
SELECT label, data, id FROM training_data;
SELECT * FROM training_data WHERE id > 10;
SELECT data, label FROM training_data WHERE label = 'positive';
SELECT id, label FROM training_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM training_data WHERE label = 'positive' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT data FROM training_data WHERE label = 'negative' ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, data FROM training_data WHERE id > 100 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM training_data WHERE data LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, label FROM training_data WHERE label = 'neutral' ORDER BY label ASC, id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM training_data;
SELECT id, label FROM training_data WHERE label = 'spam';
SELECT * FROM model_parameters WHERE learning_rate > 0.01;
SELECT model_id FROM model_parameters ORDER BY epochs DESC;
SELECT * FROM training_data WHERE feature_vector ->> 'name' = 'John';
SELECT * FROM training_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT label, feature_vector FROM training_data WHERE label = 'positive' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, label FROM training_data WHERE label IN ('positive', 'negative') LIMIT 10 OFFSET 1;
SELECT AVG(learning_rate) as avg_learning_rate FROM model_parameters;
SELECT * FROM training_data JOIN model_parameters ON training_data.id = model_parameters.model_id;
SELECT id, features, label FROM TrainingData;
SELECT * FROM Models WHERE model_type = 'Regression' ORDER BY last_trained DESC;
SELECT model_name, model_type, created_on FROM Models WHERE model_type = 'Classification' LIMIT 10;
SELECT model_id, training_accuracy, validation_accuracy FROM TrainingResults WHERE training_accuracy > 0.8;
SELECT result_id, model_id, loss, training_time FROM TrainingResults ORDER BY result_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM TrainingData WHERE label = 1 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, features->>'feature_1', label FROM TrainingData WHERE features->>'feature_1' LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT model_id, model_name, model_type, created_on FROM Models WHERE model_type = 'classification' ORDER BY created_on DESC;
SELECT result_id, model_id, training_accuracy, validation_accuracy FROM TrainingResults WHERE training_accuracy > 0.9 ORDER BY validation_accuracy DESC;
SELECT result_id, model_id, loss, training_time FROM TrainingResults WHERE loss < 0.5 ORDER BY loss ASC, training_time DESC;
SELECT id, feature_1, feature_2, label FROM training_data;
SELECT model_id, model_name, algorithm FROM model;
SELECT prediction_id, model_id, feature_1, feature_2, predicted_label FROM predictions;
SELECT evaluation_id, model_id, accuracy, precision, recall FROM evaluation_metrics;
SELECT * FROM training_data WHERE label='positive';
SELECT * FROM training_data WHERE label = 'Class_A' ORDER BY feature_1 DESC, feature_2 ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT model_id, model_name FROM model WHERE algorithm = 'Random Forest' ORDER BY model_name ASC;
SELECT prediction_id, feature_1, feature_2, predicted_label FROM predictions WHERE feature_1 > 0.5 AND feature_2 < 0.7 ORDER BY feature_1 ASC, feature_2 ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT model_id, accuracy, precision, recall FROM evaluation_metrics WHERE accuracy > 0.8 ORDER BY accuracy DESC, recall DESC;

SELECT training_data.id, model.model_name, predictions.predicted_label, evaluation_metrics.accuracy FROM training_data JOIN model ON training_data.id = model.model_id JOIN predictions ON model.model_id = predictions.model_id JOIN evaluation_metrics ON model.model_id = evaluation_metrics.model_id ORDER BY evaluation_metrics.accuracy DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM training_data LIMIT 5;
SELECT feature_1, label FROM training_data WHERE feature_1 > 0.5;
SELECT model_id, learning_rate, epochs FROM model_parameters WHERE epochs < 100;
SELECT evaluation_id, model_id, accuracy FROM model_evaluation ORDER BY accuracy DESC;
SELECT model_id, loss, accuracy FROM model_history WHERE accuracy >= 0.8;
SELECT feature_1, feature_2, label FROM training_data WHERE label = 1 ORDER BY feature_1 DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT model_id, epochs, AVG(accuracy) AS avg_accuracy FROM model_evaluation GROUP BY model_id HAVING AVG(accuracy) > 0.8 ORDER BY avg_accuracy DESC;
SELECT model_id, loss, accuracy FROM model_history WHERE model_id = 5 AND loss < 0.2 ORDER BY accuracy DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT feature_1, feature_2, label FROM training_data WHERE feature_1 > 0.5 AND feature_2 < 0.3 ORDER BY feature_1, feature_2 LIMIT 15;
SELECT model_id, learning_rate, epochs FROM model_parameters WHERE learning_rate BETWEEN 0.1 AND 0.5 ORDER BY epochs DESC LIMIT 3;
